snippet: China has offered little comment on a reported near collision at sea, although one Chinese media account says the United States Navy had been warned to move away from China’s new aircraft carrier
abstract: China has offered little comment on a reported near collision at sea, although one Chinese media account says the United States Navy had been warned to move away from China’s new aircraft carrier

headline.main: Chinese Account Says U.S. Ship Was Warned Away From Aircraft Carrier

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
